solution_line_template: The difference in age between Teresa and Morio is {morio_current_age} - {teresa_current_age} = <<{morio_current_age}-{teresa_current_age}={age_difference}>>{age_difference} years.
When their daughter is born, Teresa is {morio_age_at_birth} - {age_difference} = <<{morio_age_at_birth}-{age_difference}={teresa_age_at_birth}>>{teresa_age_at_birth} years old.
